net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker
Interface InformationListener<X>

Type Parameters:
X - The type of the delivered object.
public interface InformationListener<X>

Listens to a give information item. It is called back whenever the information item changes.

Author:
Ralf Biedert
See Also:
InformationBroker

Method Summary
 void update(X item)
          Called when the subscription requirements are met and a new item has been posted.
